OPEC.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: an organization of countries that produce and sell oil
OPEC.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: Organization of Petroleum Exporting Countries; an organization of nations that produce and sell oil and which tries to keep the price of oil at a suitable level
OPEC.translation[1].definitions[0].examp: Practically all payments to OPEC countries are made in dollars.
the reduction in demand for OPEC oil
